price: 36. Alobi: Oh Nkolo wa ngai! Pesa ngai mwa tango kino mokolo mwa bosekwisami.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
